price: Dijo [Lot]: "¡Señor mío! Sálvame de este pueblo corrupto".
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi unṣur'nī ʿalā al-qawmi al-muf'sidīna
